violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provided name 'Денис' at 0:07.887. Operator acknowledged with 'Хорошо' and moved to next question at 0:16.207 without repeating name back or requesting confirmation ('Верно?')

violations_detected.title: Echo method - partial compliance for city
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provided city 'Екатеринбург' at 0:19.607. Operator repeated 'Город Екатеринбург' at 0:21.987 but did not request confirmation ('Верно?', 'Правильно?') or wait for customer confirmation

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not fully applied for contact data
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When collecting customer name, city, or any contact data, must: (1) repeat it back verbatim, (2) ask for explicit confirmation using 'Верно?', 'Правильно?', or 'Подтверждаете?', (3) wait for customer to confirm. Example: Customer says 'Денис' → Operator should say 'Денис, верно?' → Wait for 'Да'

coaching_priorities.issue: Customer name not used throughout conversation
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After learning customer name, use it periodically during conversation to build rapport (e.g., 'Денис, сейчас посмотрю наличие' instead of just 'Сейчас посмотрю')

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting: company name '54 колеса', operator name 'Ирина', offer to help. Proper closing with thanks and farewell. Customer orientation question asked: 'Чем-то еще могу вам помочь?'

7.2.evidence: Name 'Денис' collected without echo confirmation. City 'Екатеринбург' repeated but no confirmation request
7.2.note: Critical violation: Echo method requires both repeat-back AND confirmation request with customer acknowledgment

7.3.evidence: Intro at 3.147s (within 5s threshold). Disconnect within 0.66s of last speech (within 5s threshold)

6.1.evidence: No critical silence >45s detected. Customer ended call normally

9.1.evidence: Information searches completed within acceptable timeframes. Primary search 1:02-1:24 (~22s)

9.3.evidence: Searches were brief and operator maintained conversation throughout
9.3.note: No explicit 'thank you for waiting' but searches were quick enough that it may not be required

3.1.evidence: Customer requested 4 disks for tomorrow. Operator found product but explained inventory constraint: only 1 disk available tomorrow, 4 available day after tomorrow. Customer's timing need couldn't be met due to genuine inventory limitation, not operator error
3.1.note: Operator provided thorough explanation of availability, offered reservation alternative. Customer declined due to pickup hours incompatibility (closes 8pm, customer available 9pm). This is inventory constraint, not unresolved service issue

3.6.evidence: Operator verified information through system searches ('посмотрю', 'сейчас посмотрю')

5.1.evidence: Complete information provided: product availability, pricing (1840), pickup location (Серафим и Дерябина), hours (10 до 8), timeline

10.2.evidence: Information provided logically, proper script flow maintained

10.3.evidence: Good dialogue management overall: built rapport, maintained conversation control, proper opening and closing. However, customer name 'Денис' was not used after being collected
10.3.note: Minor improvement area: should use customer name during conversation to enhance rapport

10.6.evidence: Complete and accurate product information delivered: specifications, availability, pricing, locations, hours

2.1.evidence: No call dropout or service refusal. Operator attempted to help, offered alternatives (reservation)

1.1.evidence: Professional tone maintained throughout. No profanity or rudeness. One informal 'ты' slip at 1:30.205 ('как ты завтра') but immediately self-corrected, not harsh

4.1.evidence: Customer expressed mild frustration about timing constraints. Operator handled professionally, offered solutions, maintained patience
4.1.note: Text-based assessment only; full tone analysis requires audio

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company name (54 колеса) and operator name (Ирина)
Excellent product knowledge and system navigation
Proactively offered reservation option to secure inventory
Provided complete information: availability, pricing, location, hours
Maintained patience when customer expressed frustration about timing
Proper closing with thanks and farewell
Customer orientation question asked before ending call

data_quality.confidence_notes: VTT transcript clear and complete with accurate timestamps. Word-level JSON available for enhanced echo method analysis if needed for verification
